text: Lake Okeechobee is the largest lake in the U.S. state of Florida. Lake Okeechobee covers about 730 square miles (about half the size of Rhode Island). The lake is shared by Glades, Okeechobee, Martin, Palm Beach, and Hendry counties.http://www2.census.gov/geo/maps/general_ref/stco_outline/cen2k_pgsz/stco_FL.pdf Some cities on the shore of Lake Okeechobee include: Belle Glade, Clewiston, Okeechobee, Pahokee, Moore Haven and Buckhead ridge. ==Pictures of Lake Okeechobee== Image:Lake_Okeechobee.JPG|Lake Okeechobee see from Pahokee. Image:Okeechobee lake from space.jpg|Lake Okeechobee seen from space in 1988. ==References== Category:Geography of Florida Category:Lakes of the United States Category:Palm Beach County, Florida
title: Lake Okeechobee
